name: Eldritch Cat Defense
description:
A  nightmare, a sleeping ancient evil, beautiful pixelart, towers build from positive memory - A tower defense game where you compete for the online highscore!

Created for the "Dark Season" game jam held from 10-12.2022 in the german rpg maker community. 

Hint: Achieve 5000 points to unlock a secret!

Made in RPG Maker MV with heavily custom-modified engine.

Narration and tutorial are only available in german language. The game is pretty self explanatory, though. English speakers won´t have a problem enjoying it.

A downloadable game for Windows.

Want to learn more about our games and us?
